rows.label: tev000591_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey, good to see you, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just talking with an old Pathfinder buddy of mine
from basic training.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0003
rows.name:
He asked if I wanted to team up with him to set up a
data probe in Oblivia. Think I should?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_JNK0010
rows.name: Speculate

rows.label: tev000591_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gwin if he's scared about being away from Irina.

rows.label: tev000591_JNK0020
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: tev000591_SEL0021
rows.name: Say it sounds like a good job for an Interceptor.

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0004
rows.name: N-no! It's not that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0005
rows.name:
I mean, maybe I am a LITTLE, but it's not like we're
joined at the hip or anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0006
rows.name:
I'm more worried that none of the BLADEs on this
mission have any real experience, and it sounds like
we'll be going to a pretty dangerous place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0007
rows.name: Yeah, I guess it does.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0008
rows.name:
The Interceptor clears away the indigens so the
Pathfinders can set up the probe—it's a classic strategy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0009
rows.name: But there is one thing that has me worried...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0010
rows.name:
None of the BLADEs on this mission have any real
experience, and it sounds like we'll be going to a
pretty dangerous place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: tev000591_SEL0031
rows.name: Advise Gwin to start with an easier mission.

rows.label: tev000591_JNK0040
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: tev000591_SEL0041
rows.name: Offer to accompany Gwin's team just this once.

rows.label: tev000591_JNK0050
rows.name: Lecture

rows.label: tev000591_SEL0051
rows.name:
Say Gwin will never achieve
anything if he gives into fear.

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0011
rows.name:
That's a good point—we probably shouldn't have our
first mission together in a land famous for tyrants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0012
rows.name:
I just want to catch up with my more experienced
colleagues, but if I get careless with my training and
end up dead, none of that really matters.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0013
rows.name:
I guess I should stick with missions that I know I'm
skilled enough to complete.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0014
rows.name: Thanks for the advice, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0015
rows.name:
We'll talk it over a bit more and see if we can't find a
more appropriate mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0016
rows.name: If you ever need me for anything, just say the word![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0017
rows.name: Seriously?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh man, if you came with us, I know we could do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0019
rows.name:
Er, but I think Lieutenant Irina would be pissed that
we didn't ask her for help first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0020
rows.name:
And all the tyrants in Oblivia aren't half as scary as
the lieutenant when she's angry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0021
rows.name:
Besides, I feel like this is something we should be able
to manage by ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0022
rows.name:
So I think we'll try it without anyone's help.
I really appreciate the offer, though.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0023
rows.name: If you ever need me for anything, just say the word![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0024
rows.name: Whoa. You're right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0025
rows.name:
Humanity has been fighting to survive against the wilds
of Mira since the day we arrived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0026
rows.name: And we can't afford to live in fear of failure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0027
rows.name:
Besides, the more experience I can get out in the field,
the sooner I'll be able to stand shoulder to shoulder
with my Interceptor colleagues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0028
rows.name: Yeah, you're right. I've got to clear this hurdle myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000591_MSG0029
rows.name:
Well, I'm gonna get packing. But the next time you
get a good mission, please take me with you![ST:wait ]
